verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
Father we are here
We feel Your Spirit
Drawing us nearer
Your face is suddenly clearer
Than all the world surrounding

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Father we are here
As You increase Lord
We become less
Your creation
Living to bless You
Oh Father we are here
